user_query: I want to organize a team-building activity for my colleagues and I'm looking for unique options in London. Can you suggest some fun and engaging team-building activities? Also, recommend some nearby restaurants for a team lunch.

TaskList.description: Research unique team-building activities in London.
List the top-rated unique team-building activities found in the research.
Identify nearby restaurants for a team lunch based on the activity locations.
Provide details of the recommended activities and restaurants.
